name: Cuddly Toy
description:
Kid had a cuddly toy. But one time it have been destroyed. Now your mission is to find all parts of his body. You will need to pass stages to complete task. Good luck.


  • Over 25 stages
  • Heartbreaking story
  • High level of difficulty
